response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to deliver exceptional value and performance. Given its quality and features, I believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive access and value it brings to its owner. I trust you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 200}
